fields.name: headline
fields.label: Headline
fields.description: Primary post headline that is displayed at the top of the post. The headline is used as the title displayed on the WordPress post list

fields.name: short_headline
fields.label: Short Headline
fields.description: A shorter alternative headline that could be displayed on other templates around the site such as the homepage, archive or sidebar

fields.name: standfirst
fields.label: Standfirst
fields.description: A brief introductory summary of the article, typically appearing immediately after the headline

fields.name: excerpt
fields.label: Excerpt
fields.description: A summary of the article typically displayed alongside the headline/short headline on a post list or archive, if different to the standfirst

fields.name: seo_headline
fields.label: SEO Headline
fields.description: The version of the headline that is displayed on search engine results pages. May be more keyword-focused than than a headline.

fields.name: seo_description
fields.label: SEO Description
fields.description: A summary of the article that is displayed on search engine results pages. May be more keyword-focused than standfirst or excerpt.

fields.name: social_image
fields.label: Social Share Image
fields.description: Custom image field to select an image for Social sites, if different to the featured image.

fields.name: social_headline
fields.label: Social Headline
fields.description: The version of the headline that is displayed on social channels.

fields.name: social_description
fields.label: Social Description
fields.description: A summary of the article that is displayed on social channels.

fields.name: flag
fields.label: Label/Flag
fields.description: List of terms that typically appear above a headline to help classify the content. Examples: New, Breaking, Updated, Feature, Exclusive, Sponsored

fields.name: category
fields.label: Category
fields.description: Used when selecting one or more options (eg. Categories)

fields.name: tags
fields.label: Tags
fields.description: Input field from which you get a list of suggestions (autocomplete) from which you select values.
